name: SearchStripePrices
description:
Search for previously created Stripe prices.

Use this tool to search for prices you have previously created on Stripe using the Stripe Search Query Language. Note that this function should not be used for read-after-write flows where strict consistency is necessary, as data may take some time to propagate.

parameters.name: search_query_string
parameters.description: The search query string for prices using Stripe's Search Query Language. Refer to the documentation for syntax and supported fields.

value_schema.description: The search query string. See [search query language](https://stripe.com/docs/search#search-query-language) and the list of supported [query fields for prices](https://stripe.com/docs/search#query-fields-for-prices).

parameters.name: fields_to_expand
parameters.description: List of fields in the response that should be expanded.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded.

parameters.name: result_limit
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of price objects to return. Must be between 1 and 100, with a default of 10.

value_schema.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 10.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginating through results. Omit on first call; use 'next_page' from a prior response for additional results.

value_schema.description: A cursor for pagination across multiple pages of results. Don't include this parameter on the first call. Use the next_page value returned in a previous response to request subsequent results.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Stripe API.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 10.

value_schema.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 10.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A cursor for pagination across multiple pages of results. Don't include this parameter on the first call. Use the next_page value returned in a previous response to request subsequent results.

value_schema.description: A cursor for pagination across multiple pages of results. Don't include this parameter on the first call. Use the next_page value returned in a previous response to request subsequent results.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search query string. See [search query language](https://stripe.com/docs/search#search-query-language) and the list of supported [query fields for prices](https://stripe.com/docs/search#query-fields-for-prices).

value_schema.description: The search query string. See [search query language](https://stripe.com/docs/search#search-query-language) and the list of supported [query fields for prices](https://stripe.com/docs/search#query-fields-for-prices).
